description: a(n) = [[(k^2)*n]-(k*[k*n])], where k = sqrt(2) and [] is the floor function.
maple: Digits := 89; floor_diffs_floored(sqrt(2),120); floor_diffs_floored := proc(k,upto_n) local j; [seq(floor(floor((k^2)*j)-(k*(floor(k*j)))),j=0..upto_n)]; end;
mathematica: With[{k = Sqrt[2]}, Table[Floor[Floor[k^2*j] - k*Floor[k*j]], {j, 0, 104}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 06 2016 *)
author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 03 2001
